Summary: I went out to smoke a cigarette looked up in stars and saw one satart to move no bliinking lights moving faster than satalight or plane yet seemed to slow down and then pick ip pace as it went north east to south
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to smoke a cigarrete and looked up in the notheast part of sky , sky was clear lots of stars and planes flying to the south and south west , looked up to north east sky and saw a small white but very bright light up in the stars, much to far away to be a plane, alos there was no blinking lights and it had a sparadic flight not like a plane it seemed to slow at times then speed up as it went south I yelled to my roomates and said there is something flying up in the stars, they took thier time thinking i was crazy but as soon as i showed the fisrt roomate, she herself saw what i was seeing a white light moving amoungst the stars, then she went in with me i went back out side and tred to find it in the same area however now it was going back north east i showed my roomates husband the light and he was speechelss , I pointed out the planes flying in same area and their blinking lght and the hight at wich they are flying, I lost sight after it went back north , I saw it fo ra total of 5-7 min wich is a long time to study how it flew, I am certan it was a ufo of some kind, if not any clue to what it was?
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around October 18th 2011
